text: Scorpion is a fictional character in the Mortal Kombat games for video game consoles. ==Portrayals== He was portrayed in games by Ed Boon and Patrick Seitz. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1992 Category:Fictional characters with fire or heat abilities Category:Fictional Japanese people Category:Mortal Kombat characters
title: Scorpion (Mortal Kombat)
